entry.title: Ethereum’s Merge Delayed Despite Successful ‘Shadow Fork’ Test
entry.summary: The most recent test processed mainnet transactions on a “shadow fork” – a subset of proof-of-work nodes that had been merged with the Beacon Chain to process proof-of-stake transactions.

entry.title: Major US Clearing House Experiments with CBDC for Real-Time Settlements
entry.summary: DTCC to explore whether a Federal Reserve-issued digital currency could clear a trade as soon as a brokerage sends the money.

entry.title: DeFi Protocols Heed MakerDAO’s Call to Back DAI with Real-World Assets
entry.summary: Diversifying DAI’s backing outside of crypto could protect DAI from a crypto bear market.

entry.title: Terra Hard Hit as DeFi Drops 20% in a Week
entry.summary: Terra's Short-Lived Bull Run Reverses Course

entry.title: Uniswap Joins the Hunt for Web3 Startups with New Venture Arm
entry.summary: UniSwap Expansion into Venture Investing Raises Eyebrows
